channel.title: Need help with cachedownloader.java

item.title: Need help with cachedownloader.java
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

okay so in the cache downloader.java there is this:

			if (!location.exists()) {
				// drawLoadingText("Downloading Cache Please wait...");
				downloadFile(getCacheLink(), getArchivedName());

				unZip();
				System.out.println("UNZIP");

				final BufferedWriter versionFile = new BufferedWriter(
						new FileWriter(getCacheDir() + "/cacheVersion"
								+ getCacheVersion() + ".dat"));
				versionFile.close();
			} else {
				if (!version.exists()) {
					// drawLoadingText("Downloading Cache Please wait...");
					downloadFile(getCacheLink(), getArchivedName());

but the “getArchivedName” bit isn’t included in any other file, any ideas? the cache just gets stuck on 0% thanks

PI source, with the signlink in it from the webclient tutorial pinned on at the top of client help section

Read full topic
